column5: YOU WILL FIND in the DIARIES a LOT of POLITICS AND EVEN MORE CATS     THE PERSON who MAKES the FIRST COMMENT WILL GET TWO CATS EVERY PERSON WHO COMMENTS WILL GET A CAT     RULES IN THE DIARY WHEN YOU FIND SOMETHING in the DIARY that you LIKE YOU CAN REPOST IT AS COMMENT in the DIARY  PRESIDENT JOE BIDEN President Biden: "Our goal by July 4 is to have 70% of Americans with at least one shot and 160 million Americans fully vaccinated."  President Biden warns: "People who are not fully vaccinated can still die every day from COVID-19."  President Biden on the possible Pfizer announcement for 12-15 year olds: "If that announcement comes we are ready to move immediately."  President Biden: More than 105 million Americans are fully vaccinated.  Breaking: President Biden will set new benchmarks today for the United States to return to pre-pandemic life setting a goal of 70% of adult Americans having at least one vaccine shot by the Fourth of July. https://t.co/0yv1uggAh5  President Biden: Text your ZIP code to 438829 to find vaccine locations near you.  White House proclamation: I JOSEPH R. BIDEN JR. President of the United States of America by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and the laws of the United States do hereby proclaim May 5 2021 as Missing and Murdered Indigenous Persons Awareness Day.  The White House has told states that coronavirus vaccine supply they leave unordered will become available to other states — the most significant shift in domestic vaccine distribution since President Biden took office. https://t.co/3ihSOiLRuF  YELLEN Reuters: YELLEN: SAYS UNCOLLECTED TAXES AMOUNT TO $7 TRILLION OVER A DECADE  Rep. Tom Malinowski and Sen. Sheldon Whitehouse have written to Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen urging the Department to take early action to "combat international corruption and kleptocracy."  SPEAKER PELOSI Speaker Pelosi's office is out with a statement on the McCarthy-Cheney drama the subject line reads: 'From the GOP Leadership: Help Wanted — Non-Threatening Female'.  Amid rumors that she might soon announce a run for Florida governor Rep. Val Demings just released this promotional video on her campaign Twitter account. pic.twitter.com/adRSoxPIIb  CAROLYN MALONEY Today House Oversight Chairwoman Carolyn Maloney led a group of bipartisan Members in reintroducing The Whistleblower Protection Improvement Act of 2021 to strengthen protections for federal employees who expose wrongdoing.  LIZ CHENEY There seem to be few Republicans willing to defend Liz Cheney for not embracing obvious election lies. https://t.co/pBb5FHp5j4  SIDNEY POWELL Attorneys for Dominion Voting Systems have told a federal judge that Sidney Powell must be held accountable for her attacks on Dominion or the court risks creating "unprecedented immunity for attorneys to wage televised disinformation campaigns." https://t.co/lVivlynnYS  GEORGIA Democratic Georgia State Rep. Bee Nguyen the daughter of Vietnamese refugees who has helped lead the fight against Republican-backed voter restrictions is running for Georgia Secretary of State. https://t.co/wp10hSDxVw  NEW JERSEY New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy has announced a new bid to boost coronavirus vaccinations: Receive your first dose in May and get a free beer. https://t.co/T5QNksW34P  TEXAS Two broad coalitions of companies and executives — including HP Unilever Microsoft Patagonia and Salesforce — plan to release letters today calling for expanded voting access in Texas wading into the debate over Republicans' proposed restrictions. https://t.co/6G0cM3rjCs  LOS ANGELES LOS ANGELES (AP) -- Virus cases so low that LA and San Francisco can move into California's least restrictive tier for business operations.  For the second day in a row Los Angeles County health officials reported no new COVID-19 deaths. https://t.co/ttNFlDuDoW  FLORIDA Democratic Rep. Charlie Crist of Florida has officially entered the race for governor becoming the first challenger to Republican Ron DeSantis. https://t.co/yVWHc2dWf4  PENNSYLVANIA A Pennsylvania man was sentenced to five years probation after he admitted to illegally casting his dead mother's ballot for Donald Trump during the 2020 presidential election. https://t.co/6dhP0je5Tu
